titleStmt.title: The workes of Geffray Chaucer newlye printed, wyth dyuers workes whych were neuer in print before: as in the table more playnly doth appere. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Works
titleStmt.author: Chaucer, Geoffrey, d. 1400.
Thynne, William, d. 1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [Richard Grafton for] Wyllyam Bonham, dwellynge at the sygne of the Kynges armes in Pauls Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Includes a number of spurious works.
"The Caunterbury tales", "The romau[n]t of the rose" and "Boetius de consolatione philosophie" each has separate divisional title; foliation and register are continuous.
A variant of the 1542 edition with imprint "Prynted by Iohn Reynes ..".
Title within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 20, McK. 62).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sygne of the Kynges armes in Pauls Church-yarde
